name: TrackingPackage
description:
track ups, fedex,usps and DHL packages.
Windows store app available → https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9PHP0Z68X02N?cid=rapidAPI

api_methods.name: TrackingPackage
api_methods.description: Track UPS, USPS and FedEx packages.

utterances.utterance: Can you check the status of my FedEx package with tracking number 123456789012?
Please find out where my UPS shipment 1Z999AA10123456784 is right now.
I need to track the USPS parcel with tracking code 9400110898825022579493.
Look up the delivery progress for FedEx tracking number 987654321098.
Could you tell me the current location of my UPS package 1Z12345E0291980793?
Track the USPS shipment with tracking number 9205590175547700043241 and let me know if it’s out for delivery.
Find the latest update on my FedEx delivery using tracking ID 61299999999999999999.
Check where my UPS package 1Z0X1234567890123 is and when it will arrive.
Can you track the USPS parcel with tracking number 9405511899223857423456 and confirm if it has been delivered?
Please provide the current status of my FedEx shipment with tracking number 449044304137821.
